branchCategory.name: SYA
branchCategory.description: <P>SYA 5 port air operated valves are available in body ported or base mounted styles.&nbsp; The SYA uses the same manifolds as series SY (non plug-in style) for types 20, 41, 42 and 45.&nbsp;One-touch fittings are available on body ported types.&nbsp; Available thread types are Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.</P>

branchItem.name: SYA3000, 5000, 7000, 5 Port Air Operated Valve, All Types
branchItem.description: <P>SYA 5 port air operated valves are available in body ported or base mounted styles.&nbsp; The SYA uses the same manifolds as series SY (non plug-in style) for types 20, 41, 42 and 45.&nbsp;One-touch fittings are available on body ported types.&nbsp; Available thread types are Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.</P>
